price: Por haber preferido quedarse con los eximidos, Dios bloqueó sus corazones y no pueden discernir.
arabic: رَضُواْ بِأَن يَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: raḍū bi-an yakūnū maʿa al-khawālifi waṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
